homePage.hero.title: Giving Paws a Second Chance
homePage.hero.subtitle: At KUTTAWAALA, we believe every animal deserves a loving home. Join us in our mission to rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome animals in need.
homePage.mission.title: Our Mission
homePage.mission.text: KUTTAWAALA is dedicated to providing a safe haven for stray, abandoned, and abused animals. We offer medical care, nourishment, and a loving environment, with the ultimate goal of finding them a forever family. We are a community-powered organization, and your support makes all the difference.
homePage.preview.title: Meet Some Friends
homePage.preview.subtitle: These lovely souls are looking for a forever home. Maybe one of them is for you?
homePage.quiz.title: Find Your Perfect Paw-tner
homePage.quiz.subtitle: Not sure which pet is right for you? Take our quick and easy quiz to find the best companion for your lifestyle and personality!
homePage.success.title: Happy Tails
homePage.success.subtitle: Read the heartwarming stories of animals who found their forever homes through KUTTAWAALA.
homePage.volunteer.title: Make a Difference
homePage.volunteer.subtitle: Our volunteers are the backbone of our organization. By giving your time and skills, you can directly impact the lives of animals in need. Join our compassionate team today!
homePage.donate.title: Your Support Saves Lives
homePage.donate.subtitle: Your generous donations help us provide food, shelter, and critical veterinary care to animals in need. Every contribution, big or small, helps us write a new chapter for a deserving animal.
adoptPage.title: Find Your New Best Friend
adoptPage.subtitle: These wonderful animals are waiting for a loving family to call their own. Click on a pet's profile to learn more about them and to start the adoption process.
adoptPage.quiz.title: Can't Decide?
adoptPage.quiz.subtitle: Take our quick personality quiz to find the pet that best matches your lifestyle!
adoptPage.rehome.title: Need to Rehome Your Pet?
adoptPage.rehome.text: If you need to find a loving new home for your pet, we're here to help. Please email us high-quality, clear pictures (no videos please) and a detailed description of your pet including their name, breed, age, temperament, and any medical history. Our team will review your submission and, if approved, feature them on our adoption page.
animalCard.favorite.loginPrompt: Please log in to save your favorites!
animalDetail.notFound.title: Animal not found!
animalDetail.notFound.subtitle: The animal you are looking for might have been adopted or the link is incorrect.

reportPage.subtitle: See an animal that needs help? Fill out the form below, and our rescue team will be alerted.

aiAssistantPage.title: AI Vet
aiAssistantPage.subtitle: Get general guidance and first-aid information for your pet.
aiAssistantPage.warning.title: IMPORTANT: This is not a substitute for professional veterinary advice.
aiAssistantPage.warning.subtitle: This AI is for informational and first-aid purposes only. For any medical emergency or health concern, please consult a licensed, in-person veterinarian immediately.
aiAssistantPage.clearChat.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the entire chat history? This action cannot be undone.
aiAssistantPage.initialGreeting: Hello! I'm KUTTAWAALA's AI Vet. I can provide general guidance and first-aid information. How can I help you today?
aiAssistantPage.input.placeholder: Ask a question about pet care...
aiAssistantPage.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
aiAssistantPage.disclaimer.body: I am an AI Vet and not a substitute for professional veterinary advice. This information is for general guidance and first-aid purposes only. ALWAYS consult a licensed, in-person veterinarian for any health concerns or emergencies.
generic.error.api: I'm sorry, but an error occurred while processing your request. This could be due to a network issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.
generic.error.apiKey: I'm sorry, but there seems to be an issue with the application configuration. Please contact the site administrator.
findVetPage.title: Find a Vet Clinic
findVetPage.subtitle: Find trusted, local veterinary clinics for your pet's health needs. Please call ahead to confirm hours and availability for emergencies.
findVetPage.select.label: Select Your District
findVetPage.results.none.title: No Clinics Found
findVetPage.results.none.subtitle: We don't have any clinics listed for "{{district}}" at the moment. Please check back later or try a nearby district.
findVetPage.results.placeholder: Please select a district to view vet clinics.
findVetPage.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
findVetPage.disclaimer.text: The veterinary clinics listed above are for informational purposes only and are not sponsored by or affiliated with KUTTAWAALA. We do not receive any compensation for these listings. We encourage you to do your own research and consult at your own discretion when choosing a veterinary service for your pet.

communityPage.subtitle: Share stories, ask questions, and connect with fellow animal lovers.

faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and how you can help.
quizPage.title: Find Your Perfect Paw-tner
quizPage.subtitle: Answer a few quick questions to discover which of our wonderful animals might be the best fit for you.

quizPage.results.none.title: No exact matches right now
quizPage.results.none.subtitle: We don't have a perfect match right now, but please check out all our available animals. The perfect friend for you might just be a click away!
volunteerPage.title: Join Our Volunteer Team
volunteerPage.subtitle: Volunteers are the heart of KUTTAWAALA. Your time, skills, and passion can make a world of difference in the lives of animals.
volunteerPage.form.title: Become a Volunteer

memorialPage.subtitle: A place to honor and remember the beloved animal companions who have crossed the rainbow bridge. Gone but never forgotten.

cookieBanner.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and secure your session. By clicking "Accept all", you consent to our use of all functional cookies.
errorBoundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
errorBoundary.subtitle: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try refreshing the page.
modals.cookieInfo.title: About Our Cookies
modals.cookieInfo.intro: We use cookies to make our site work, to personalize your experience, and to remember your choices. Here's a breakdown of the types of cookies we use:
modals.cookieInfo.necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies (Always Active)
modals.cookieInfo.necessary.description: These cookies are essential for you to browse the website and use its features. They are required to remember your cookie consent choice. You cannot opt out of these.
modals.cookieInfo.functional.title: Functional & Preferences Cookies (Optional)
modals.cookieInfo.functional.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They remember choices you make (like your preferred language or theme) to provide a better, more personal experience. These are only stored if you 'Accept all'.
modals.cookieInfo.functional.cookie3: Stores the IDs of your favorite animals.
modals.cookieInfo.functional.cookie4: Saves your chat history with the AI Vet.
modals.cookieInfo.functional.cookie5: Saves community posts created by users.
modals.cookieInfo.functional.cookie6: Saves memorial tributes created by users.
modals.cookieInfo.outro: By choosing 'Accept necessary', only the strictly necessary cookies will be used. By choosing 'Accept all', you agree to the use of all cookies described above.
